summary: This Mod Adds 2 New Followers to the Game. You can Tell them to follow you and help you on your quests. Take care of them and give them some better equipment, Have fun and enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
- Lexie De Yuolo
- Description 
 
She is Bored in Markarth as there isn\'t alot of work to do and the pay is very low. She wants to go on an adventure with an interesting person and have a more interesting life.

- Location -
 Markarth  Silver-Blood Inn

-Sophia De Costo
- Description

She was a Soldier in the army with the stormcloaks, she used to be a spy and infiltrate enemy territory. Once she nearly got caught and decide to stop and it was VERY dangerous and would cost her here life. She decide to work in an inn after that.

- Location -
Falkreath  Dead man\'s Drink.

Video -
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGQaI9Kbbrg

Requires 
Apachii Sky Hair

---
author: UnkownRb
